body:
I think this is were Syaoran asked for help but this isn't the help i thought he would get.

Nope. I can't accept this, Syaoran to me you are disgrace..

NTR is NTR. No excuse.
"How did you lost your v-card?"
"Well. I tripped on something and fell vagina face right onto a rock hard dick"
They are practicing for Sakura. Platonic polyamorous sex between close friends is something cute I can get behind!
I think this is before Syaoran and Sakura have their first time together. From what I gather, Yamazaki says to Syaoran that Chiharu can help him out...
Well, that's a shame.  Up to now all the Workaholic CCS stories have been cute vanilla between sakura and syaoran.  What brought this trash about?
NTR what does syaoran a sakura
